_description: Christ’s Will and Testament, a version of the ‘Short’ Charter of Christ — in couplets

BodDod147.Note: Medieval MS source unknown; probably a copy of London,  British Library Add. Charter 5960.
BodDod147.Editions:
Astle,  Thomas. 
             “An Ancient Poem,” 
             The Antiquarian Repertory.
            Thomas Astle,
                              and  Francis Grose,
                            eds. 
         4 vols. London: Blyth, Sewell, Evans, 1775: 1.21.
